ISSUE.TITLE: `now -t <token> domain buy myco.com` is not working
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I tried `now -t <token> domain buy myco.com` but its falling back to my default now account and not respecting provided token account. using now@5.0.0

COMMIT.MESSAGE: [now-build-utils] Make `download()` a no-op in `now dev` (#474) This will be necessary for the update in `now dev` to have the builder `workPath` be equal to the `cwd` source directory of the dev server. Otherwise, unnecessary file modifications are made (copying the source file to itself) and file corruption often occurs.
